turn.3: It's big stuff, man! Like- ya know how some people literally feel like they're gonna shit themselves when they're super nervous? =Vagus nerve. That suck runs alllll the way down your upper and lower GI tracts. Also, did you know that our stomachs produce serotonin? It can't cross the blood-brain barrier, but it signals the vagus nerve to tell the brain *itself* to produce serotonin. This is one reason why gut health is linked to emotional health. And there's SO much more we don't even know yet! Anyway, have fun exploring all of this; great ELI5 question :)
